channel.title: Virtualization on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours
channel.description: Recent content in Virtualization on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours

item.title: Initial Fedora libvirt Setup
item.description: There are always a few things I need to do to get libvirt working with a non-root user on Fedora that I need to do, and typically results in some Google researching. Here are some notes of what I recently did to get my libvirt setup going on a new Fedora 25 installation and working with a non-root user. NOTE I found this tuxfixer blog post while doing some other research for this blog post, which basically does everything I’m about to say, but he does some other network setup and things I’d have done via nmcli and the console.
